title: If Viktor and Jayce got into a kissing contest, who do you think could kiss the most?
body:
I think Viktor could on account of he's a robot and can do anything, even make Heimerdinger copy him (now he has a hand on his back too?)

Who do you think could kiss the most, I changed my mind I think it's Jayce?

replies.body: This thread confuses me. Like, why would Jayce be kissing anyone? We all know Jayce is secretly Sion's right pinky toe.
Well, if Jayce could get Draven to prioritize him over Draven, then I say Jayce would win. Otherwise, it's Heimerdinger.
60% of people think Jayce should get the most skins, I think Riot really needs to make more Jayce skins in light of this new information (one of the skins can be he's wearing a hat?)
I'm more confused then the time I found out Hannah Montana was Miley Cyrus.
